General.Name: SUNIC SYSTEM Co. Ltd
General.Description: SUNIC SYSTEM Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells OELD equipment. It offers OELD equipment, including cluster type and inline type evaporation equipment systems. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Suwon, South Korea. SUNIC SYSTEM Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Dong A Eltek Co., Ltd.

5.Name: Mr. Young  Im
5.Title: Exec. VP & Director of Research Center
